actions.name: Crackling Fury
actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares an attack.
Effect: Connection - Plasma Fists. The triggering attack has its Power increase by 60%, and it gains [Recoil 1/6] until the end of the user's Activation. When under 1/3 HP, this bonus increases to 90%.
